sentences.sentence: I will come to see you again restfully!
sentences.translation: 我会平安地与你们再次相见！

sentences.sentence: It is very RESTfully designed, so you can use any code that can request data from a URL.
sentences.translation: 它是基于REST风格设计的，所以您可以使用任何用来从URL请求数据的代码。

sentences.sentence: First, APP will be a nice example that shows people how to design new systems RESTfully.
sentences.translation: 首先，APP将成为告诉人们如何设计rest化的新系统的好例子。
